xwikidoc.title: MapMacro Translations
xwikidoc.content:
rendering.macro.map.name=Mapa rendering.macro.map.description=Ukázať interaktívnu mapu rendering.macro.map.parameter.location.name=Umiestnenie ### Missing: rendering.macro.map.parameter.location.description=Location to map rendering.macro.map.parameter.width.name=Šírka rendering.macro.map.parameter.width.description=Šírka mapy v pixeloch. rendering.macro.map.parameter.height.name=Výška rendering.macro.map.parameter.height.description=Výška mapy v pixeloch. rendering.macro.map.parameter.zoom.name=Zoom ### Missing: rendering.macro.map.parameter.zoom.description=The initial zoom the map will be focused at. Default is 15, which is about the size of a block of houses. rendering.macro.map.parameter.errors.name=Chyby ### Missing: rendering.macro.map.parameter.errors.description=Display a popup with the returned status code when it is anything other than "OK" (values: show(default)/hide). ### Missing: rendering.macro.map.content.description=Information to display as legend of the location mapped. ### Missing: macroMap.apiKey.info=To use the map macro with Google Maps or Mapbox, you must get a {0}Google API key{1} or a {2}Mapbox access token{3}. If you use the default library (Leaflet) and the default tile server (OpenStreetMap), no API key or token is needed. ### Missing: macroMap.apiKey.invalid=There is no valid Google API key for this macro. Please visit the {0}Map Macro section{1}.
### Missing: admin.mapmacro=Map Macro
